Name: MPI_MODE_APPEND
Description:
MPI_MODE_APPEND is a flag that can be passed to MPI_File_open to make sure data is added after existing content, by setting the initial position of all file pointers to the end of the file.
Other tags are: MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_MODE_RDWR, MPI_MODE_WRONLY, MPI_MODE_CREATE, MPI_MODE_EXCL, MPI_MODE_DELETE_ON_CLOSE, MPI_MODE_UNIQUE_OPEN and MPI_MODE_SEQUENTIAL.
